attributes.title: Horrible!!
attributes.review: This app was so bad ! I would not recommend it for anyone , I went to a trump rally once and Donald trump called me a “fat girl” he was being very rude to everyone there ,mostly woman, I will be deleting the app but just had to let everyone know to not download this horrible app, have a good day.

attributes.title: DO DOWNLOAD THIS APP
attributes.review: Okay i downloaded this app and then i started to get nightmares of this orange chasing me. The nightmares got so bad that i had to go to therapy and it costed me a lot because u know healthcare in this country cost a lot. DO NOT DOWNLOAD THIS APP. It will give you nightmares and drain your bank account because you have to go to threpy for it😭😭😭😭😭

attributes.title: This app shouldn’t even exist 🤢🤢
attributes.review: It is the worst app I have ever came across in the history of the planet. It doesn’t work at all I just wanted to learn more about my president but no it is very slow and useless and unhelpful jus like our   🍊president he can gooo with this app too 👉🚪 thank you😊

attributes.title: Worst app😢
attributes.review: This is definitely the worst app I've ever downloaded . Every time I would open it it would close immediately. I got so angry trying to open the app that I impulsively broke up with my boyfriend. Now I'm crying in my bed with a broken heart. Don’t get this app, it will ruin your life.

attributes.title: Absolutely horrible!!!
attributes.review: As a member of the younger generation this app is the WORST!!! I’ve never seen an app so dysfunctional or an app run by someone even more dysfunctionally insane! WHO LET THIS APP BE CREATED? I am disgusted by the fact that there are so many people who stand behind me in my thoughts. It is clear this app needs to go.

attributes.title: Terrible App
attributes.review: This is probably the worst app I’ve ever used. It was extremely slow and made my phone glitch. Not to mention the fact that this app basically spews hate speech into others. Horribly made and I’m hoping to see this app taken down.

attributes.title: Horrible
attributes.review: I wanted to support our president bunker baby as much as I could so I tried to get the app and it took 7 days to download and install. While it was loading I couldn’t use ANY apps and I couldn’t even leave a review until it finished installing 🤢🤮🤮

attributes.title: im appalled😡
attributes.review: i downloaded this because i was very interested but as soon as i did it played awful music that attracted so many rodents that called them selves "republicans"or "conservatives". Im very confused and want an explanation for the behavior this app inspired to cause such foolishness acts upon these rodents. i recommend this app is just deleted.

attributes.title: I HAD TO GET A NEW PHONE
attributes.review: I thought by downloading this app I would somehow understand our President and maybe side with him on some topics but once I got on the app my phone started to glitch so bad that I had to get a new one. This app gave my old phone a virus which isn’t surprising coming from Mr. Trump himself.

attributes.title: Horrible app
attributes.review: This app took so long to download and when it finally downloaded I would try and open up the app and it would glitch me out. I have tried repeatedly to reboot or delete and reinstall this app and it still has problems. TAKE DOWN THIS APP
